fr.rmi

Class ServerRMI

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • fr.rmi.ServerRMI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Listener, Server

    public abstract class ServerRMI
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
    The ServerRMI class is used to manage RMI servers.

    This class extends UnicastRemoteObject class.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • ServerRMI

        public ServerRMI(java.lang.String name,
                 int port)
          throws java.net.UnknownHostException,
                 java.rmi.RemoteException
        Builder of the ServerRMI class.
        Parameters:
        name - - Server name.
        port - - Server port.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the registry could not be exported or contacted.
        java.net.UnknownHostException - if the local host name could not be resolved into an address.

        Set the server log status.
        Parameters:

      • open

        public void open()
          throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                 java.net.MalformedURLException
        Open the server.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the registry could not be exported or contacted.
        java.net.MalformedURLException - if the name is not an appropriately formatted URL

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.rmi.AccessException,
                  java.rmi.RemoteException,
                  java.rmi.NotBoundException
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the registry could not be exported or contacted.
        java.rmi.NotBoundException - if name is not currently bound.
        java.rmi.AccessException - if this registry is local and it denies the caller access to perform this operation.

      • log

        public void log(java.lang.String log)
        Display a log on the server console.
        Parameters:
        log - - Message to display.
